Instruction: Cut the nectarines in half and remove the pits.
In a small bowl, mix together melted butter, honey, and cinnamon.
Place the nectarines cut side up on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Brush the honey mixture over the nectarines.
Bake in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, or until the nectarines are tender and caramelized.
Remove from the oven and let them cool slightly before serving.
Serve the honey glazed nectarines warm as a delightful and sweet side dish or dessert.
